title: Mitchell
author: Mitchell
created_time: October 03, 2022, 08:20:35 PMLast edit: August 02, 2023, 09:54:25 PM by Mitchell
content: Hello everyone,I'm hereby auction off a bunch of error/miscut/test notes made by Polymerbit. Every note is it's own lot, so please make sure to specify what you are bidding for.LotsPolymerbit - CoinFest - Teslin - Test print - 2017Polymerbit - Pratical - Mini - April Fools - 1mBTC - full sheet testPolymerbit - 100 miliBitcoin - First Edition - Cancelled option - Only 10 existsPolymerbit - Liechtenstein example note - 2018 - One of 3Polymerbit - Triangle Series - 2mBTC - Miscut/damaged - KeylessPolymerbit - Triangle Series - 2mBTC - Damaged - KeylessPolymerbit - CoinFest 2019 - Obverse reverse error - KeylessPolymerbit - CoinFest 2019 - Miscut - KeylessPolymerbit - 100 miliBitcoin - First Edition - MiscutCurrent bidsSwissCrab - 0.008BTCMoparMiningLLC - 0.0055BTCSwissCrab - 0.007BTCSwissCrab - 0.0085BTCMinerjones - 0.0025BTCaoluain - 0.003BTCSwissCrab - 0.003BTCSwissCrab - 0.003BTCSwissCrab - 0.003BTCAuction detailsStarting bid: Check current bids for the minimum.Bid increment: 0.0005BTCShipping: Not included. Shipping will be based on location and preference.End date and time: Thursday, 06 October at 23:59 (Amsterdam Time)Sniping: Bids in the last 10 minutes extend the whole auction (not just the lot) to a maximum of 10 minutes after the last bid.Payment: I only accept Bitcoin and payment must be send to bc1q3msvf8dlgx20vjclzjk2wg0quhuacwpvhdn95v. Make sure to send me your TXID.Other:Proof of funds or a collateral may be asked from new bidders to be eligible to bid on the auction.I reserve the right to reject bids from or deny sale to any individual for any reason.PicturesPolymerbit - CoinFest - Teslin - Test print - 2017   Polymerbit - Pratical - Mini - April Fools - 1mBTC - full sheet test   Polymerbit - 100 miliBitcoin - First Edition - Cancelled option - Only 10 exists   Polymerbit - Liechtenstein example note - 2018 - One of 3   Polymerbit - Triangle Series - 2mBTC - Miscut/damaged - Keyless   Polymerbit - Triangle Series - 2mBTC - Damaged - Keyless    Polymerbit - CoinFest 2019 - Obverse reverse error - Keyless   Polymerbit - CoinFest 2019 - Miscut - Keyless   Polymerbit - 100 miliBitcoin - First Edition - Miscut

Been a while since I've done an auction. I've set it to 0.0005BTC, which is a fair amount and makes your bids valid.
